import { Button, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; function Cart() { let a = useSelector((state) => { return state }) // redux store 가져와줌 console.log(a.shoppingBasket); let getBasket = a.cart; return (
# 상품명 수량 변경하기
{getBasket[0].id} {getBasket[0].name} {getBasket[0].count}
{getBasket[1].id} {getBasket[1].name} {getBasket[1].count}
) } export default Cart;
